Deprecated API

Contents

  • For Removal
  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • For Removal
    Element
    Description
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.Packet.packetHandler
    No use.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.Packet.setPacketHandler​(PacketHandler)
    Access the packetHandler direct.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.readCharSequence()
    This is only a replacement for PacketBuffer.readString(), so use this or PacketBuffer.readCharSequence(int, Charset).
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence​(CharSequence)
    Use PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence(CharSequence, Charset) instead
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil
    This class is deprecated since PacketBuffer exists which is not only a replacement for BufferUtil but also can be modified for reading more complex data types.
    This class will be removed in a functional beta/alpha release.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.getVarIntSize​(int)
    Use PacketBuffer.getVarIntSize(int) instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.readVarInt​(ByteBuf)
    Use PacketBuffer.readVarInt() instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.writeVarInt​(ByteBuf, int)
    Use PacketBuffer.writeVarInt(int) instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.Serializable
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.Serializable.serialize​(PacketBuffer)
  • Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.Serializable
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil
    This class is deprecated since PacketBuffer exists which is not only a replacement for BufferUtil but also can be modified for reading more complex data types.
    This class will be removed in a functional beta/alpha release.

    Field
    Description
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.Packet.packetHandler
    No use.
  • Methods
    Method
    Description
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.Packet.setDefaultHandler​(PacketHandler)
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.Packet.setPacketHandler​(PacketHandler)
    Access the packetHandler direct.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.order()
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.order​(ByteOrder)
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.readCharSequence()
    This is only a replacement for PacketBuffer.readString(), so use this or PacketBuffer.readCharSequence(int, Charset).
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.readString​(int)
    Use PacketBuffer.readString() instead, as the maxLength is almost useless and was only used in Minecraft for such things as a scoreboard.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.readString_old()
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence​(CharSequence)
    Use PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence(CharSequence, Charset) instead
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.packets.PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence​(CharSequence, Charset)
    use PacketBuffer.writeCharSequence(CharSequence) instead as you don't have to know the exact length there.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.getVarIntSize​(int)
    Use PacketBuffer.getVarIntSize(int) instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.readVarInt​(ByteBuf)
    Use PacketBuffer.readVarInt() instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.BufferUtil.writeVarInt​(ByteBuf, int)
    Use PacketBuffer.writeVarInt(int) instead. For further information, see BufferUtil.
    de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.util.Serializable.serialize​(PacketBuffer)
